resources.string: Could not find an appropriate application
In a chat, use the Assistant to quickly find and share info about movies, restaurants and more. To bring up the Assistant, touch & hold the Home button or say “Ok Google”. %1$s
Share info from the Google Assistant

Messages creates suggestions while it keeps your conversation on device. You can tap suggestions to see & share info from the Google Assistant.

Learn more & manage in Settings

"Messages sent with chat features from Google use the Rich Communications Services (RCS) protocol, so they are sent over the Internet instead of as SMS/MMS, and temporarily pass through Google's RCS servers for message delivery purposes.
Messages are deleted once delivered and secured with TLS encryption. You can turn this off at any time in Settings."
To ensure delivery by your carrier, some characters in this message will be converted. You can change this behaviour in Settings.

By turning on chat features from Google, you agree to the %1$s and %2$s

By turning on chat features from Google, you agree to the %1$s and %2$s. For phone-number-based message delivery, Google may occasionally verify your number by exchanging your device info with your operator or via SMS (charges may apply). You can disable chat features from Settings. %3$s.
Chat over Wi-Fi and data, share higher-quality photos and more with others who have chat features
To turn on chat features from Google, you agree to the %1$s and %2$s. Google will occasionally verify your number by exchanging your device info with your operator (SMS charges may apply).
"To receive SMS messages from iPhone users, you'll need to turn off iMessage on your old phone. You can still use iMessage on other devices, such as an iPad."
You can also text over Wi-Fi, share high-quality photos and more
New! See when friends are typing
To help prevent spam, Google uses the phone numbers of unknown senders and recipients. Your messages and contacts are not sent to Google. %1$s

Messages learns from your conversations using privacy-preserving technology. Your conversations stay on your device. %1$s

Allow smart features to learn over time. Your conversations stay on your device while privacy-preserving technology combines information from you and many other participants. This lets Google improve Messages features for everyone. %1$s

Suggestions are not shared with Google or anyone else until you tap them.
